meanings.definition: Too many to be counted; countless.
meanings.sent1: There were innumerable stars in the night sky.
meanings.sent2: The beach was covered in innumerable seashells.
meanings.sent3: The innumerable amount of homework made the students groan.
meanings.sent4: Her love for him was as innumerable as the grains of sand on the shore.
meanings.sent5: The innumerable flowers in the garden created a colorful paradise.

meanings.definition: Incapable of being numbered or counted.
meanings.sent1: The artist's talent was truly innumerable.
meanings.sent2: The complexity of the problem seemed innumerable to the students.
meanings.sent3: Trying to organize the innumerable amount of books was a daunting task.
meanings.sent4: His patience was like an innumerable well, never running dry.
meanings.sent5: The innumerable possibilities of the future excited her.
